item.title: HarmonyOS SDK17 Timer
item.description: targetSdkVersion HarmonyOS 5.0.5(API 17) Timer @Entry @Component struct Index { @State currentTime: string = ''; @State minutes: number = 0; @State seconds: number = 0; @State totalSeconds: number = 0; @State remainingSeconds: number = 0; @State isRunning: boolean = false; @State isPaused: boolean = false; @State isFinished: boolean = false; private timer: number = -1; private clockTimer: number = -1; aboutToAppear() { this.updateCurrentTime(); this.clockTimer = setInterval(() => { this.updateCurrentTime(); }, 1000); } aboutToDisappear() { if (this.
